title: Any interest in a PSA 5 Livingstone T206?
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: Any interest in a PSA 5 Livingstone T206?
posts.post_content:
This one isn't mine to sell; I'd just like to help someone buy it.

[url]http://goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=25194[/url]

I placed the opening bid a couple of weeks ago and have since decided to go in a different collecting direction, so here's my offer.

Outbid me today (My max is just the $100, so $110 will put you in the lead.), and in return I'll transfer $20 to your Paypal account. Just let me know with a PM a few minutes before you do it, so I can be reasonably certain I'm paying the right bidder.

I win, you win, Goodwin wins, the consignor wins. It's the rare win-win-win-win situation.
Okay then, let's make it $30. Any takers?
